name: Operand

properties.name: displayName
properties.description: The localized display name for the corresponding field in the Find dialog.
properties.longdesc: If not supplied, the valueName is used.

description: A helper object for node searches.
longdesc: An array of these objects is kept in SearchCriteria.operands. They are used to populate the right-side field in the line that corresponds to the criterion in the Find dialog (values to be compared against). If there is more than one, the field displays a drop-down list.
